title: Business Analyst - Electronics Manufacturing Services
description:
Business Analyst - EMS

Location: Surat

Experience: 2 to 5 Years

Role Summary

Report to the Program Manager & Promoter


Responsible for development & execution of operational work plan
Own the execution of modules for a new business build.
Drive complete ownership of module across plant setup, portfolio strategy, sales strategy and execution etc.


Industry Experience


Experience in program management role – Relevant roles: Consultant, Associate, Jr. Program Manager
2+ years experience in a Big 4/Similar management consultancy roles
Experience in EMS is a plus Skills, Abilities & Know-how Generalist Profile
Ability to drive varied modules & ramp-up quickly
Strong track record of performance across different projects/executing multiple project modules


Project Management


Experience of project management in cross functional environment with multiple dependencies
Know how of operational aspects of SMT (Surface Mount Technology) line setup
Experience of establishing processes and improving them to enable smooth ramp up
Strong Track record in executing roadmaps and project to success
Exceptional communication, people skills


Stakeholder Management


Working closely with the promoter to drive new business execution. Work in startup mode by managing a small team to drive results
Manage & work with team to achieve milestones Project Management:
Running forums and conducting regular check ins and tracking project progress by defining KPIs and driving accountability
Ownership of business process analysis, process and system strategy definition, requirement documentation, and execution planning
Implementing frameworks to enable enforcement and alignment of project timelines, milestones & objectives across functions to deliver high quality results
